items.summary: Update the in-app FAQ page (frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx) so it displays the owner-provided “Xocial.Stream — FAQ” content exactly word-for-word (including punctuation, capitalization, and paragraph breaks), replacing all existing FAQ questions/answers and the page heading.

Add a lightweight safeguard in the FAQPage implementation so the FAQ content is stored as a single immutable in-file constant (single source of truth) and rendered from that constant, to reduce the risk of accidental partial edits or content drift during future UI refactors.
